MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY4 postcode area of Cowdenbeath, affecting properties in Moss Side Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4.57am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of difficult ground conditions when excavating  and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:42pm on 25th of January 2020.
